text: TricondylomimusChopard L (1930) Bull. Soc. ent. Fr. 1930: 229. is an Asian genus of praying mantis in the family Iridopterygidae.Mantodea Species File (Version 5.0/5.0: retrieved 1 September 2019) Previously placed as a synonym of Nemotha, Chopard's original genus name was restored in 2017.Stiewe & Shcherbakov (2017) Annales de la Société entomologique de France (N.S.) 53(3): 175-196. == Species == The Mantodea Species File lists: * Tricondylomimus coomani Chopard, 1930 – type species (locality Vietnam) * Tricondylomimus intermedius Stiewe & Shcherbakov, 2017 * Tricondylomimus mirabiliis Beier, 1935 == References == == External Links== * Category:Mantodea genera Category:Insects of Southeast Asia Category:Iridopteryginae
title: Tricondylomimus
